message: I think @zain was telling me too

yeah
it's a classic mystery kind of show
nice

like Watson has a blog
haha
that's awkward
haha i remember when we were at the bar and @leah was like "I love sherlock but the fourth episode is SO HARD TO FIND" and I was like "...there's only three episodes..."
Oh yeah, that's where I remember!
best show I've seen in a long time
I think I keep bringing it up, but it's worth watching... and it's only 3 episodes so far
I've heard good reviews from several people
I'll have to try it out!
@zain you don't know how hard I looked for it!
I love this show! They are making the second season AS WE SPEAK!
Man everyone likes this show
leah: i read somewhere that when it was broadcast on the BBC, each of what's shown as an episode in itunes was actually broken up into parts
I bought the first episode (which is actually three episodes, I guess, since it's an hour and a half long) but haven't watched it yet
@djchall... Actually the episodes are just super long!
@djchall that makes sense since they're so long
I think I might have to buy the first season just based on the recs I've heard
well, I'm weak. S01's downloading now
i love this show. but isn't it no going to be on again until 2012 or something ridiculous?
omg, I thought there were new episodes in March...?
wait, lemme consult the google
@parislemon I actually saw an Instagram photo of you watching Sherlock
still...
but yeah...
Man I gotta try this show
it's more like 3 mini movies
yeah, I watched them like movies
and kind of freaked out because it's my favorite new show
@ericflo what's great is that it's only 3 episodes but they're 90 mins. different from the norm
so it's like a 9 episode season of a 30 minute show. still short, but not too bad
okay 3 more episodes in the Fall of 2011
that's not too bad
I really enjoyed the first episode, like really really. But the other two episodes were more like meeeh, but I hope the show comes back!

The Show has already been picked up for new episodes this summer. At first I wasn't sure if I want to see a modern Sherlock Holmes. But they did an impressive job in porting the spirit of the old stories into the modern world. Also the actors are chosen well.
I have the first two episodes, I think. I need to watch the second and get the third from someone at some point. I got caught up watching Nero Wolfe.
The episodes were shown on TV here (Netherlands) as movies; full, 90-minute contiguous blocks. It was pretty great. I think the show is superbly done, can't wait to see more!
I'm halfway through the first episode...this show is good!
never heard of this TV-Show ..
I quite enjoyed the series. Very smart, and modern take on a classic. :)
you guys have to watch the original 60 minutes pilot. it's available as bonus feature on the dvd...
I have never watched it. Any good?
It was great can't wait for it to return.
agreed. kinda wished it'll be just an hour long and adapting the short stories though
Sherlock was brilliant, although he reminded me of the 11th Doctor at times.  :)
Awesome show! I do hope there are more episodes though
